alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 4:10PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Collier, northwestern Hendry and southwestern Glades Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 409 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Port La Belle, or 9 miles southeast of Labelle, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Labelle, Port La Belle, Ortona, Felda and Keri. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
